name: Dhinesh
title: Founder & CEO
microBio: Founder leading company vision, technical direction, and internship programs. Builds full-stack applications and mentors students with a fundamentals-first approach.
fullBio: Dhinesh is the founder and CEO of 6ixminds Labs. He leads the company vision, technical strategy, and overall execution. With hands-on experience in full-stack development, he focuses on building practical solutions and structured internship programs that prepare students for real-world development.
responsibilities: Define company vision and execution strategy
Design and manage internship training programs
Mentor students and review project deliverables

projects.title: Certificate Verification System
projects.summary: Online certificate generation and verification portal.

name: Dileep
title: Co-Founder & Operations Lead
microBio: Co-founder supporting operations and learning embedded systems and IoT fundamentals through hands-on projects.
fullBio: Dileep is a co-founder of 6ixminds Labs, contributing to operational coordination and embedded systems learning. He supports internal workflows and participates in embedded and IoT-related projects under guided execution.
responsibilities: Learn and apply embedded systems fundamentals

name: Prabhakaran
title: Project Manager & Advisor
microBio: Manages project planning, execution flow, and provides guidance to ensure structured delivery.
fullBio: Prabhakaran serves as the project manager and advisor at 6ixminds Labs. He oversees project planning, timelines, and execution while providing guidance to maintain clarity and structure across development and training initiatives.

name: Anandh
title: IoT Developer
microBio: Works on IoT development, hardware integration, and basic automation solutions.
fullBio: Anandh works as an IoT developer at 6ixminds Labs, focusing on integrating hardware devices with software systems. His work includes sensor integration, device communication, and simple automation use cases.

name: Nithish Kumar
title: Embedded & PCB Design Trainee
microBio: Trainee learning embedded systems and PCB design through guided hands-on practice.
fullBio: Nithish Kumar is a trainee at 6ixminds Labs focusing on embedded systems and PCB design fundamentals. He is learning circuit design, PCB layout basics, and embedded programming through practical exercises.

name: Sathish
title: Media & Digital Marketing Executive
microBio: Handles video content creation and digital marketing activities for brand visibility.
fullBio: Sathish manages video editing and digital marketing at 6ixminds Labs. He creates visual content, promotional materials, and supports online engagement for company services and training programs.
